name: NewSubfileType
shortDescription: A general indication of the kind of data contained in this subfile.
note:
Req'd in LC RFP97-6 Section C.4.7.

Usage rule in JHOVE TIFF module.

Mandatory for TIFF/EP.

name: SubfileType
shortDescription: A general indication of the kind of data contained in this subfile.

name: ImageWidth
shortDescription: The number of columns in the image, i.e., the number of pixels per row.
note:
Listed in LoC Baseline Tags.

Req'd in LC RFP97-6 Section C.4.7. Provide actual pixel count.

Req'd in LC NDNP TIFF profile. See Appendix B. Image width in pixels.

Mandatory for TIFF 6.0 classes B, G, P, R, and Y.1

Mandatory for TIFF/EP.

For Exif, mandatory in primary TIFF IFD.

name: ImageLength
shortDescription: The number of rows of pixels in the image.
note:
Listed in LoC Baseline Tags.

Req'd in LC RFP97-6 Section C.4.7. Provide actual pixel count.

Req'd in LC NDNP TIFF profile. Image length in pixels.

Mandatory for TIFF 6.0 classes B, G, P, R, and Y.1

Mandatory for TIFF/EP.

For Exif, mandatory in primary TIFF IFD.

name: BitsPerSample
shortDescription: Number of bits per component.
note:
Listed in LoC Baseline Tags.

Req'd in LC RFP97-6 Section C.4.7.

Mandatory for TIFF 6.0 classes G, P, R, and Y.1

Mandatory for TIFF/EP.

For Exif, mandatory in primary TIFF IFD.

Required by DLF benchmark guidelines

name: Compression
shortDescription: Compression scheme used on the image data.
note:
Listed in LoC Baseline Tags. Sample values: 1=uncompressed and 4=CCITT Group 4.

Req'd in LC RFP97-6 Section C.4.7.

Mandatory for TIFF 6.0 classes B, G, P, R, and Y.1

Mandatory for TIFF/EP.

For Exif, mandatory in primary TIFF IFD.

Required by DLF benchmark guidelines

name: PhotometricInterpretation
shortDescription: The color space of the image data.
note:
Listed in LoC Baseline Tags. Sample values: 1=black is zero and 2=RGB. Document also states "RGB is assumed to be sRGB; if RGB, an ICC profile should be present in the 34675 tag."

Req'd in LC RFP97-6 Section C.4.7

Mandatory for TIFF 6.0 classes B, G, P, R, and Y.1

Mandatory for TIFF/EP.

Mandatory for GeoTIFF_1_0.

For Exif, mandatory in primary TIFF IFD.

Required by DLF benchmark guidelines

name: Threshholding
shortDescription: For black and white TIFF files that represent shades of gray, the technique used to convert from gray to black and white pixels.

name: CellWidth
shortDescription: The width of the dithering or halftoning matrix used to create a dithered or halftoned bilevel file.

name: CellLength
shortDescription: The length of the dithering or halftoning matrix used to create a dithered or halftoned bilevel file.

name: FillOrder
shortDescription: The logical order of bits within a byte.

name: DocumentName
shortDescription: The name of the document from which this image was scanned.
note:
Listed in LoC Baseline Tags.

Req'd in LC RFP97-6 Section C.4.7. Provide collection identifier and filename.

Req'd in LC NDNP TIFF profile. Provide microfilm reel number or normalized LCCN.

Also used by HD Photo.

name: ImageDescription
shortDescription: A string that describes the subject of the image.

name: Make
shortDescription: The scanner manufacturer.
note:
Listed in LoC Baseline Tags.

Req'd in LC NDNP TIFF profile.

Also used by HD Photo.

Mandatory for TIFF/EP.

name: Model
shortDescription: The scanner model name or number.
note:
Listed in LoC Baseline Tags.

Req'd in LC NDNP TIFF profile. Provide "model name, model number, serial number."

Also used by HD Photo.

Mandatory for TIFF/EP.

name: StripOffsets
shortDescription: For each strip, the byte offset of that strip.
note:
Listed in LoC Baseline Tags.

Req'd in LC RFP97-6 Section C.4.7

Mandatory for TIFF 6.0 classes B, G, P, R, and Y.1 (Files outside of these classes may use tiles and tags 322, 323, 324, and 325; Comments welcome.)

Mandatory in TIFF/EP for stripped images.

For Exif, mandatory in primary TIFF IFD.

name: Orientation
shortDescription: The orientation of the image with respect to the rows and columns.
note:
Req'd in LC NDNP TIFF profile.

Mandatory for TIFF/EP.

name: SamplesPerPixel
shortDescription: The number of components per pixel.
note:
Listed in LoC Baseline Tags. Sample values: 8 8 8.

Req'd in LC RFP97-6 Section C.4.7.

Req'd in LC NDNP TIFF profile.

Mandatory for TIFF 6.0 classes R and Y.1

For Exif, mandatory in primary TIFF IFD.

Required by DLF benchmark guidelines

name: RowsPerStrip
shortDescription: The number of rows per strip.
note:
Listed in LoC Baseline Tags.

Req'd in LC RFP97-6 Section C.4.7.

Mandatory for TIFF 6.0 classes B, G, P, R, and Y.1 (Files outside of these classes may use tiles and tags 322, 323, 324, and 325; Comments welcome.)

Mandatory in TIFF/EP for stripped images.

For Exif, mandatory in primary TIFF IFD.

name: StripByteCounts
shortDescription: For each strip, the number of bytes in the strip after compression.
note:
Listed in LoC Baseline Tags.

Req'd in LC RFP97-6 Section C.4.7

Mandatory for TIFF 6.0 classes B, G, P, R, and Y.1 (Files outside of these classes may use tiles and tags 322, 323, 324, and 325; Comments welcome.)

Mandatory in TIFF/EP for stripped images.

For Exif, mandatory in primary TIFF IFD.

name: MinSampleValue
shortDescription: The minimum component value used.

name: MaxSampleValue
shortDescription: The maximum component value used.

name: XResolution
shortDescription: The number of pixels per ResolutionUnit in the ImageWidth direction.
note:
Listed in LoC Baseline Tags.

Req'd in LC RFP97-6 Section C.4.7. Provide actual pixel count or pixels per inch.

Req'd in LC NDNP TIFF profile. Xresolution is a Rational; ImageWidth (Tag 256) is the numerator and the length of the source (measured in the units specified in ResolutionUnit (Tag 296)) is the denominator.

Mandatory for TIFF 6.0 classes B, G, P, R, and Y.1

Mandatory for TIFF/EP.

For Exif, mandatory in primary TIFF IFD.

Required by DLF benchmark guidelines

name: YResolution
shortDescription: The number of pixels per ResolutionUnit in the ImageLength direction.
note:
Listed in LoC Baseline Tags.

Req'd in LC RFP97-6 Section C.4.7. Provide actual pixel count or pixels per inch.

Req'd in LC NDNP TIFF profile. Yresolution is a Rational; ImageLength (Tag 257) is the numerator and the width of the source (measured in the units specified in ResolutionUnit (Tag 296)) is the denominator.

Mandatory for TIFF 6.0 classes B, G, P, R, and Y.1

Mandatory for TIFF/EP.

For Exif, mandatory in primary TIFF IFD.

Required by DLF benchmark guidelines

name: PlanarConfiguration
shortDescription: How the components of each pixel are stored.

name: PageName
shortDescription: The name of the page from which this image was scanned.

name: XPosition
shortDescription: X position of the image.

name: YPosition
shortDescription: Y position of the image.

name: FreeOffsets
shortDescription: For each string of contiguous unused bytes in a TIFF file, the byte offset of the string.

name: FreeByteCounts
shortDescription: For each string of contiguous unused bytes in a TIFF file, the number of bytes in the string.

name: GrayResponseUnit
shortDescription: The precision of the information contained in the GrayResponseCurve.

name: GrayResponseCurve
shortDescription: For grayscale data, the optical density of each possible pixel value.

name: T4Options
shortDescription: Options for Group 3 Fax compression

name: T6Options
shortDescription: Options for Group 4 Fax compression

name: ResolutionUnit
shortDescription: The unit of measurement for XResolution and YResolution.
note:
Listed in LoC Baseline Tags.

Req'd in LC RFP97-6 Section C.4.7. Code 1 for actual pixel count or 2 for pixels per inch.

Req'd in LC NDNP TIFF profile. Value 2 for inches is preferred.

Mandatory for TIFF 6.0 classes B, G, P, R, and Y.1

Mandatory for TIFF/EP.

For Exif, mandatory in primary TIFF IFD.

name: PageNumber
shortDescription: The page number of the page from which this image was scanned.

name: TransferFunction
shortDescription: Describes a transfer function for the image in tabular style.

name: Software
shortDescription: Name and version number of the software package(s) used to create the image.
note:
Listed in LoC Baseline Tags. Document states "Acceptable to include only capture software; preferred to list both capture and post-capture processing software (if applicable), separated by ";".

Req'd in LC NDNP TIFF profile. Include version.

Also used by HD Photo.

Mandatory for TIFF/EP.

name: DateTime
shortDescription: Date and time of image creation.
note:
Listed in LoC Baseline Tags.

Req'd in LC RFP97-6 Section C.4.7. Datetime when scanned.

Req'd in LC NDNP TIFF profile.

Also used by HD Photo.

Usage rule in JHOVE TIFF module.

Mandatory for TIFF/EP.

name: Artist
shortDescription: Person who created the image.
note:
Listed in LoC Baseline Tags. Document states "Insitution name followed (if applicable) by ";" and name of scanning contractor.

Req'd in LC RFP97-6 Section C.4.7. "Library of Congress."

Req'd in LC NDNP TIFF profile. Provide "institution name; scanning contractor."

Also used by HD Photo

name: HostComputer
shortDescription: The computer and/or operating system in use at the time of image creation.

name: Predictor
shortDescription: A mathematical operator that is applied to the image data before an encoding scheme is applied.

name: WhitePoint
shortDescription: The chromaticity of the white point of the image.

name: PrimaryChromaticities
shortDescription: The chromaticities of the primaries of the image.

name: ColorMap
shortDescription: A color map for palette color images.

name: HalftoneHints
shortDescription: Conveys to the halftone function the range of gray levels within a colorimetrically-specified image that should retain tonal detail.

name: TileWidth
shortDescription: The tile width in pixels. This is the number of columns in each tile.
note:
Mandatory for TIFF 6.0 files that use tiles. (Files that use strips employ tags 273, 278, and 279.)

Mandatory in TIFF/EP for tiled images.

name: TileLength
shortDescription: The tile length (height) in pixels. This is the number of rows in each tile.
note:
Referenced in JHOVE TIFF module for files that use tiles. (Files that use strips employ tags 273, 278, and 279.)

Mandatory in TIFF/EP for tiled images.

name: TileOffsets
shortDescription: For each tile, the byte offset of that tile, as compressed and stored on disk.
note:
Mandatory for TIFF 6.0 files that use tiles. (Files that use strips employ tags 273, 278, and 279.)

Mandatory in TIFF/EP for tiled images.

name: TileByteCounts
shortDescription: For each tile, the number of (compressed) bytes in that tile.
note:
Mandatory for TIFF 6.0 files that use tiles. (Files that use strips employ tags 273, 278, and 279.)

Mandatory in TIFF/EP for tiled images.

name: BadFaxLines
shortDescription: Used in the TIFF-F standard, denotes the number of 'bad' scan lines encountered by the facsimile device.

name: CleanFaxData
shortDescription: Used in the TIFF-F standard, indicates if 'bad' lines encountered during reception are stored in the data, or if 'bad' lines have been replaced by the receiver.

name: ConsecutiveBadFaxLines
shortDescription: Used in the TIFF-F standard, denotes the maximum number of consecutive 'bad' scanlines received.

name: SubIFDs
shortDescription: Offset to child IFDs.

name: InkSet
shortDescription: The set of inks used in a separated (PhotometricInterpretation=5) image.

name: InkNames
shortDescription: The name of each ink used in a separated image.

name: NumberOfInks
shortDescription: The number of inks.

name: DotRange
shortDescription: The component values that correspond to a 0% dot and 100% dot.

name: TargetPrinter
shortDescription: A description of the printing environment for which this separation is intended.

name: ExtraSamples
shortDescription: Description of extra components.

name: SampleFormat
shortDescription: Specifies how to interpret each data sample in a pixel.

name: SMinSampleValue
shortDescription: Specifies the minimum sample value.

name: SMaxSampleValue
shortDescription: Specifies the maximum sample value.

name: TransferRange
shortDescription: Expands the range of the TransferFunction.

name: ClipPath
shortDescription: Mirrors the essentials of PostScript's path creation functionality.

name: XClipPathUnits
shortDescription: The number of units that span the width of the image, in terms of integer ClipPath coordinates.

name: YClipPathUnits
shortDescription: The number of units that span the height of the image, in terms of integer ClipPath coordinates.

name: Indexed
shortDescription: Aims to broaden the support for indexed images to include support for any color space.

name: JPEGTables
shortDescription: JPEG quantization and/or Huffman tables.

name: OPIProxy
shortDescription: OPI-related.

name: GlobalParametersIFD
shortDescription: Used in the TIFF-FX standard to point to an IFD containing tags that are globally applicable to the complete TIFF file.

name: ProfileType
shortDescription: Used in the TIFF-FX standard, denotes the type of data stored in this file or IFD.

name: FaxProfile
shortDescription: Used in the TIFF-FX standard, denotes the 'profile' that applies to this file.

name: CodingMethods
shortDescription: Used in the TIFF-FX standard, indicates which coding methods are used in the file.

name: VersionYear
shortDescription: Used in the TIFF-FX standard, denotes the year of the standard specified by the FaxProfile field.

name: ModeNumber
shortDescription: Used in the TIFF-FX standard, denotes the mode of the standard specified by the FaxProfile field.

name: Decode
shortDescription: Used in the TIFF-F and TIFF-FX standards, holds information about the ITULAB (PhotometricInterpretation = 10) encoding.

name: DefaultImageColor
shortDescription: Defined in the Mixed Raster Content part of RFC 2301, is the default color needed in areas where no image is available.

name: JPEGProc
shortDescription: Old-style JPEG compression field. TechNote2 invalidates this part of the specification.

name: JPEGInterchangeFormat
shortDescription: Old-style JPEG compression field. TechNote2 invalidates this part of the specification.

name: JPEGInterchangeFormatLength
shortDescription: Old-style JPEG compression field. TechNote2 invalidates this part of the specification.

name: JPEGRestartInterval
shortDescription: Old-style JPEG compression field. TechNote2 invalidates this part of the specification.

name: JPEGLosslessPredictors
shortDescription: Old-style JPEG compression field. TechNote2 invalidates this part of the specification.

name: JPEGPointTransforms
shortDescription: Old-style JPEG compression field. TechNote2 invalidates this part of the specification.

name: JPEGQTables
shortDescription: Old-style JPEG compression field. TechNote2 invalidates this part of the specification.

name: JPEGDCTables
shortDescription: Old-style JPEG compression field. TechNote2 invalidates this part of the specification.

name: JPEGACTables
shortDescription: Old-style JPEG compression field. TechNote2 invalidates this part of the specification.

name: YCbCrCoefficients
shortDescription: The transformation from RGB to YCbCr image data.

name: YCbCrSubSampling
shortDescription: Specifies the subsampling factors used for the chrominance components of a YCbCr image.

name: YCbCrPositioning
shortDescription: Specifies the positioning of subsampled chrominance components relative to luminance samples.

name: ReferenceBlackWhite
shortDescription: Specifies a pair of headroom and footroom image data values (codes) for each pixel component.
note:
Mandatory for TIFF 6.0 class Y.1

Mandatory for TIFF/EP YCbCr images.

name: StripRowCounts
shortDescription: Defined in the Mixed Raster Content part of RFC 2301, used to replace RowsPerStrip for IFDs with variable-sized strips.

name: XMP
shortDescription: XML packet containing XMP metadata

name: Image.Rating
shortDescription: Ratings tag used by Windows

name: Image.RatingPercent
shortDescription: Ratings tag used by Windows, value as percent

name: ImageID
shortDescription: OPI-related.

name: Wang Annotation
shortDescription: Annotation data, as used in 'Imaging for Windows'.

name: CFARepeatPatternDim
shortDescription: For camera raw files from sensors with CFA overlay.
sourceOfTag:
TIFF/EP spec, p. 23

Exif private IFD
note: Mandatory in TIFF/EP for CFA files.

name: CFAPattern
shortDescription: For camera raw files from sensors with CFA overlay.
sourceOfTag:
TIFF/EP spec, p. 23

Exif private IFD
note: Mandatory in TIFF/EP for CFA files.

name: BatteryLevel
shortDescription: Encodes camera battery level at time of image capture.
sourceOfTag:
TIFF/EP spec, p. 45

Exif private IFD

name: Copyright
shortDescription: Copyright notice.
note:
Also used by HD Photo.

Mandatory for TIFF/EP

name: ExposureTime
shortDescription: Exposure time, given in seconds.
sourceOfTag:
Exif Private IFD

TIFF/EP spec, p. 38

name: FNumber
shortDescription: The F number.
sourceOfTag:
Exif Private IFD

TIFF/EP spec, p. 39

name: MD FileTag
shortDescription: Specifies the pixel data format encoding in the Molecular Dynamics GEL file format.

name: MD ScalePixel
shortDescription: Specifies a scale factor in the Molecular Dynamics GEL file format.

name: MD ColorTable
shortDescription: Used to specify the conversion from 16bit to 8bit in the Molecular Dynamics GEL file format.

name: MD LabName
shortDescription: Name of the lab that scanned this file, as used in the Molecular Dynamics GEL file format.

name: MD SampleInfo
shortDescription: Information about the sample, as used in the Molecular Dynamics GEL file format.

name: MD PrepDate
shortDescription: Date the sample was prepared, as used in the Molecular Dynamics GEL file format.

name: MD PrepTime
shortDescription: Time the sample was prepared, as used in the Molecular Dynamics GEL file format.

name: MD FileUnits
shortDescription: Units for data in this file, as used in the Molecular Dynamics GEL file format.

name: ModelPixelScaleTag
shortDescription: Used in interchangeable GeoTIFF_1_0 files.

name: IPTC/NAA
shortDescription: IPTC-NAA (International Press Telecommunications Council-Newspaper Association of America) metadata.
note:
Tag name and values defined by IPTC-NAA Info Interchange Model & Digital Newsphoto Parameter Record.

Called IPTS at AWare Web site.

name: INGR Packet Data Tag
shortDescription: Intergraph Application specific storage.

name: INGR Flag Registers
shortDescription: Intergraph Application specific flags.

name: IrasB Transformation Matrix
shortDescription: Originally part of Intergraph's GeoTIFF tags, but likely understood by IrasB only.

name: ModelTiepointTag
shortDescription: Originally part of Intergraph's GeoTIFF tags, but now used in interchangeable GeoTIFF_1_0 files.
note: In GeoTIFF_1_0, either this tag or 34264 must be defined, but not both

name: Site
shortDescription: Site where image created.

name: ColorSequence
shortDescription: Sequence of colors if other than CMYK.

name: IT8Header
shortDescription: Certain inherited headers.

name: RasterPadding
shortDescription: Type of raster padding used, if any.

name: BitsPerRunLength
shortDescription: Number of bits for short run length encoding.

name: BitsPerExtendedRunLength
shortDescription: Number of bits for long run length encoding.

name: ColorTable
shortDescription: Color value in a color pallette.

name: ImageColorIndicator
shortDescription: Indicates if image (foreground) color or transparency is specified.
note: For MP, BP, and BL only2

name: BackgroundColorIndicator
shortDescription: Background color specification.

name: ImageColorValue
shortDescription: Specifies image (foreground) color.
note: For MP, BP, and BL only2

name: BackgroundColorValue
shortDescription: Specifies background color.

name: PixelIntensityRange
shortDescription: Specifies data values for 0 percent and 100 percent pixel intensity.

name: TransparencyIndicator
shortDescription: Specifies if transparency is used in HC file.

name: ColorCharacterization
shortDescription: Specifies ASCII table or other reference per ISO 12641 and ISO 12642.

name: HCUsage
shortDescription: Indicates the type of information in an HC file.

name: TrapIndicator
shortDescription: Indicates whether or not trapping has been applied to the file.

name: CMYKEquivalent
shortDescription: Specifies CMYK equivalent for specific separations.

name: Reserved
shortDescription: For future TIFF/IT use

name: Reserved
shortDescription: For future TIFF/IT use

name: Reserved
shortDescription: For future TIFF/IT use

name: ModelTransformationTag
shortDescription: Used in interchangeable GeoTIFF_1_0 files.
note: In GeoTIFF_1_0, either this tag or 33922 must be defined, but not both

name: Photoshop
shortDescription: Collection of Photoshop 'Image Resource Blocks'.

name: Exif IFD
shortDescription: A pointer to the Exif IFD.
note:
Also used by HD Photo.

For Exif, mandatory in primary TIFF IFD, if present.

name: InterColorProfile
shortDescription: ICC profile data.
sourceOfTag:
TIFF/EP spec, p. 47

Exif private IFD
note:
Also called ICC Profile.

Also used by HD Photo

name: ImageLayer
shortDescription: Defined in the Mixed Raster Content part of RFC 2301, used to denote the particular function of this Image in the mixed raster scheme.

name: GeoKeyDirectoryTag
shortDescription: Used in interchangeable GeoTIFF_1_0 files.

name: GeoDoubleParamsTag
shortDescription: Used in interchangeable GeoTIFF_1_0 files.

name: GeoAsciiParamsTag
shortDescription: Used in interchangeable GeoTIFF_1_0 files.

name: ExposureProgram
shortDescription: The class of the program used by the camera to set exposure when the picture is taken.
sourceOfTag:
Exif Private IFD

TIFF/EP spec, p. 41

name: SpectralSensitivity
shortDescription: Indicates the spectral sensitivity of each channel of the camera used.
sourceOfTag:
Exif Private IFD

TIFF/EP spec, p. 48

name: GPSInfo
shortDescription: A pointer to the Exif-related GPS Info IFD.
sourceOfTag:
TIFF/EP spec, p. 34

Exif private IFD

name: ISOSpeedRatings
shortDescription: Indicates the ISO Speed and ISO Latitude of the camera or input device as specified in ISO 12232.
sourceOfTag:
Exif Private IFD

TIFF/EP spec, p. 47

name: OECF
shortDescription: Indicates the Opto-Electric Conversion Function (OECF) specified in ISO 14524.
sourceOfTag:
Exif Private IFD

TIFF/EP spec, p. 48

name: Interlace
shortDescription: Indicates the field number of multifield images.
sourceOfTag:
TIFF/EP spec, p. 22

Exif private IFD

name: TimeZoneOffset
shortDescription: Encodes time zone of camera clock relative to GMT.
sourceOfTag:
TIFF/EP spec, p. 38

Exif private IFD

name: SelfTimeMode
shortDescription: Number of seconds image capture was delayed from button press.
sourceOfTag:
TIFF/EP spec, p. 45

Exif private IFD

name: SensitivityType
shortDescription: The SensitivityType tag indicates PhotographicSensitivity tag, which one of the parameters of ISO 12232. Although it is an optional tag, it should be recorded when a PhotographicSensitivity tag is recorded. Value = 4, 5, 6, or 7 may be used in case that the values of plural parameters are the same.

name: StandardOutputSensitivity
shortDescription: This tag indicates the standard output sensitivity value of a camera or input device defined in ISO 12232. When recording this tag, the PhotographicSensitivity and SensitivityType tags shall also be recorded.

name: RecommendedExposureIndex
shortDescription: This tag indicates the recommended exposure index value of a camera or input device defined in ISO 12232. When recording this tag, the PhotographicSensitivity and SensitivityType tags shall also be recorded.

name: ISOSpeed
shortDescription: This tag indicates the ISO speed value of a camera or input device that is defined in ISO 12232. When recording this tag, the PhotographicSensitivity and SensitivityType tags shall also be recorded.

name: ISOSpeedLatitudeyyy
shortDescription: This tag indicates the ISO speed latitude yyy value of a camera or input device that is defined in ISO 12232. However, this tag shall not be recorded without ISOSpeed and ISOSpeedLatitudezzz.

name: ISOSpeedLatitudezzz
shortDescription: This tag indicates the ISO speed latitude zzz value of a camera or input device that is defined in ISO 12232. However, this tag shall not be recorded without ISOSpeed and ISOSpeedLatitudeyyy.

name: HylaFAX FaxRecvParams
shortDescription: Used by HylaFAX.

name: HylaFAX FaxSubAddress
shortDescription: Used by HylaFAX.

name: HylaFAX FaxRecvTime
shortDescription: Used by HylaFAX.

name: ExifVersion
shortDescription: The version of the supported Exif standard.

name: DateTimeOriginal
shortDescription: The date and time when the original image data was generated.
sourceOfTag:
Exif Private IFD

TIFF/EP spec, p. 37

name: DateTimeDigitized
shortDescription: The date and time when the image was stored as digital data.

name: ComponentsConfiguration
shortDescription: Specific to compressed data; specifies the channels and complements PhotometricInterpretation

name: CompressedBitsPerPixel
shortDescription: Specific to compressed data; states the compressed bits per pixel.
sourceOfTag:
Exif Private IFD

TIFF/EP spec, p. 27

name: ShutterSpeedValue
shortDescription: Shutter speed.
sourceOfTag:
Exif Private IFD

TIFF/EP spec, p. 39

name: ApertureValue
shortDescription: The lens aperture.
sourceOfTag:
Exif Private IFD

TIFF/EP spec, p. 39

name: BrightnessValue
shortDescription: The value of brightness.
sourceOfTag:
Exif Private IFD

TIFF/EP spec, p. 40

name: ExposureBiasValue
shortDescription: The exposure bias.
sourceOfTag:
Exif Private IFD

TIFF/EP spec, p. 40

name: MaxApertureValue
shortDescription: The smallest F number of the lens.
sourceOfTag:
Exif Private IFD

TIFF/EP spec, p. 40

name: SubjectDistance
shortDescription: The distance to the subject, given in meters.
sourceOfTag:
Exif Private IFD

TIFF/EP spec, p. 44

name: MeteringMode
shortDescription: The metering mode.
sourceOfTag:
Exif Private IFD

TIFF/EP spec, p. 41

name: LightSource
shortDescription: The kind of light source.
sourceOfTag:
Exif Private IFD

TIFF/EP spec, p. 46

name: Flash
shortDescription: Indicates the status of flash when the image was shot.
sourceOfTag:
Exif Private IFD

TIFF/EP spec, p. 42

name: FocalLength
shortDescription: The actual focal length of the lens, in mm.
sourceOfTag:
Exif Private IFD

TIFF/EP spec, p. 44

name: FlashEnergy
shortDescription: Amount of flash energy (BCPS).
sourceOfTag:
TIFF/EP spec, p. 43

Exif Private IFD

name: SpatialFrequencyResponse
shortDescription: SFR of the camera.
sourceOfTag:
TIFF/EP spec, p. 49

Exif Private IFD

name: Noise
shortDescription: Noise measurement values.
sourceOfTag:
TIFF/EP spec, p. 49

Exif Private IFD

name: FocalPlaneXResolution
shortDescription: Number of pixels per FocalPlaneResolutionUnit (37392) in ImageWidth direction for main image.
sourceOfTag:
TIFF/EP spec, p. 18

Exif Private IFD

name: FocalPlaneYResolution
shortDescription: Number of pixels per FocalPlaneResolutionUnit (37392) in ImageLength direction for main image.
sourceOfTag:
TIFF/EP spec, p. 19

Exif Private IFD

name: FocalPlaneResolutionUnit
shortDescription: Unit of measurement for FocalPlaneXResolution(37390) and FocalPlaneYResolution(37391).
sourceOfTag:
TIFF/EP spec, p. 19

Exif Private IFD

name: ImageNumber
shortDescription: Number assigned to an image, e.g., in a chained image burst.
sourceOfTag:
TIFF/EP spec, p. 32

Exif Private IFD

name: SecurityClassification
shortDescription: Security classification assigned to the image.
sourceOfTag:
TIFF/EP spec, p. 33

Exif Private IFD

name: ImageHistory
shortDescription: Record of what has been done to the image.
sourceOfTag:
TIFF/EP spec, p. 33

Exif Private IFD

name: SubjectLocation
shortDescription: Indicates the location and area of the main subject in the overall scene.
sourceOfTag:
Exif Private IFD

TIFF/EP spec, p. 45
note: Called SubjectArea (from Exif spec) at AWare Web site

name: ExposureIndex
shortDescription: Encodes the camera exposure index setting when image was captured.
sourceOfTag:
TIFF/EP spec, p. 47

Exif Private IFD

name: TIFF/EPStandardID
shortDescription: For current spec, tag value equals 1 0 0 0.
sourceOfTag:
TIFF/EP spec, p. 16

Exif Private IFD

name: SensingMethod
shortDescription: Type of image sensor.
sourceOfTag:
TIFF/EP spec, p. 22

Exif Private IFD

name: MakerNote
shortDescription: Manufacturer specific information.

name: UserComment
shortDescription: Keywords or comments on the image; complements ImageDescription.

name: SubsecTime
shortDescription: A tag used to record fractions of seconds for the DateTime tag.

name: SubsecTimeOriginal
shortDescription: A tag used to record fractions of seconds for the DateTimeOriginal tag.

name: SubsecTimeDigitized
shortDescription: A tag used to record fractions of seconds for the DateTimeDigitized tag.

name: ImageSourceData
shortDescription: Used by Adobe Photoshop.

name: XPTitle
shortDescription: Title tag used by Windows, encoded in UCS2

name: XPComment
shortDescription: Comment tag used by Windows, encoded in UCS2

name: XPAuthor
shortDescription: Author tag used by Windows, encoded in UCS2

name: XPKeywords
shortDescription: Keywords tag used by Windows, encoded in UCS2

name: XPSubject
shortDescription: Subject tag used by Windows, encoded in UCS2

name: FlashpixVersion
shortDescription: The Flashpix format version supported by a FPXR file.

name: ColorSpace
shortDescription: The color space information tag is always recorded as the color space specifier.

name: PixelXDimension
shortDescription: Specific to compressed data; the valid width of the meaningful image.

name: PixelYDimension
shortDescription: Specific to compressed data; the valid height of the meaningful image.

name: RelatedSoundFile
shortDescription: Used to record the name of an audio file related to the image data.

name: Interoperability IFD
shortDescription: A pointer to the Exif-related Interoperability IFD.

name: FlashEnergy
shortDescription: Indicates the strobe energy at the time the image is captured, as measured in Beam Candle Power Seconds

name: SpatialFrequencyResponse
shortDescription: Records the camera or input device spatial frequency table and SFR values in the direction of image width, image height, and diagonal direction, as specified in ISO 12233.

name: FocalPlaneXResolution
shortDescription: Indicates the number of pixels in the image width (X) direction per FocalPlaneResolutionUnit on the camera focal plane.

name: FocalPlaneYResolution
shortDescription: Indicates the number of pixels in the image height (Y) direction per FocalPlaneResolutionUnit on the camera focal plane.

name: FocalPlaneResolutionUnit
shortDescription: Indicates the unit for measuring FocalPlaneXResolution and FocalPlaneYResolution.

name: SubjectLocation
shortDescription: Indicates the location of the main subject in the scene.

name: ExposureIndex
shortDescription: Indicates the exposure index selected on the camera or input device at the time the image is captured.

name: SensingMethod
shortDescription: Indicates the image sensor type on the camera or input device.

name: FileSource
shortDescription: Indicates the image source.
note: Req'd in LC NDNP TIFF profile. Values: "microfilm," "microfiche," or "print."

name: SceneType
shortDescription: Indicates the type of scene.

name: CFAPattern
shortDescription: Indicates the color filter array (CFA) geometric pattern of the image sensor when a one-chip color area sensor is used.

name: CustomRendered
shortDescription: Indicates the use of special processing on image data, such as rendering geared to output.

name: ExposureMode
shortDescription: Indicates the exposure mode set when the image was shot.

name: WhiteBalance
shortDescription: Indicates the white balance mode set when the image was shot.

name: DigitalZoomRatio
shortDescription: Indicates the digital zoom ratio when the image was shot.

name: FocalLengthIn35mmFilm
shortDescription: Indicates the equivalent focal length assuming a 35mm film camera, in mm.

name: SceneCaptureType
shortDescription: Indicates the type of scene that was shot.

name: GainControl
shortDescription: Indicates the degree of overall image gain adjustment.

name: Contrast
shortDescription: Indicates the direction of contrast processing applied by the camera when the image was shot.

name: Saturation
shortDescription: Indicates the direction of saturation processing applied by the camera when the image was shot.

name: Sharpness
shortDescription: Indicates the direction of sharpness processing applied by the camera when the image was shot.

name: DeviceSettingDescription
shortDescription: This tag indicates information on the picture-taking conditions of a particular camera model.

name: SubjectDistanceRange
shortDescription: Indicates the distance to the subject.

name: ImageUniqueID
shortDescription: Indicates an identifier assigned uniquely to each image.
note: Req'd in LC NDNP TIFF profile. Microfilm reel sequence number. If from paper: "issue date-edition-page sequence."

name: CameraOwnerName
shortDescription: Camera owner name as ASCII string.

name: BodySerialNumber
shortDescription: Camera body serial number as ASCII string.

name: LensSpecification
shortDescription: This tag notes minimum focal length, maximum focal length, minimum F number in the minimum focal length, and minimum F number in the maximum focal length, which are specification information for the lens that was used in photography. When the minimum F number is unknown, the notation is 0/0.

name: LensMake
shortDescription: Lens manufacturer name as ASCII string.

name: LensModel
shortDescription: Lens model name and number as ASCII string.

name: LensSerialNumber
shortDescription: Lens serial number as ASCII string.

name: GDAL_METADATA
shortDescription: Used by the GDAL library, holds an XML list of name=value 'metadata' values about the image as a whole, and about specific samples.

name: GDAL_NODATA
shortDescription: Used by the GDAL library, contains an ASCII encoded nodata or background pixel value.

name: PixelFormat
shortDescription: A 128-bit Globally Unique Identifier (GUID) that identifies the image pixel format.

name: Transformation
shortDescription: Specifies the transformation to be applied when decoding the image to present the desired representation.

name: Uncompressed
shortDescription: Specifies that image data is uncompressed.

name: ImageType
shortDescription: Specifies the image type of each individual frame in a multi-frame file.

name: ImageWidth
shortDescription: Specifies the number of columns in the transformed photo, or the number of pixels per scan line.

name: ImageHeight
shortDescription: Specifies the number of pixels or scan lines in the transformed photo.

name: WidthResolution
shortDescription: Specifies the horizontal resolution of a transformed image expressed in pixels per inch.

name: HeightResolution
shortDescription: Specifies the vertical resolution of a transformed image expressed in pixels per inch.

name: ImageOffset
shortDescription: Specifies the byte offset pointer to the beginning of the photo data, relative to the beginning of the file.

name: ImageByteCount
shortDescription: Specifies the size of the photo in bytes.

name: AlphaOffset
shortDescription: Specifies the byte offset pointer the beginning of the planar alpha channel data, relative to the beginning of the file.

name: AlphaByteCount
shortDescription: Specifies the size of the alpha channel data in bytes.

name: ImageDataDiscard
shortDescription: Signifies the level of data that has been discarded from the image as a result of a compressed domain transcode to reduce the file size.

name: AlphaDataDiscard
shortDescription: Signifies the level of data that has been discarded from the planar alpha channel as a result of a compressed domain transcode to reduce the file size.

name: ImageType
shortDescription: Specifies the image type of each individual frame in a multi-frame file.

name: Oce Scanjob Description
shortDescription: Used in the Oce scanning process.

name: Oce Application Selector
shortDescription: Used in the Oce scanning process.

name: Oce Identification Number
shortDescription: Used in the Oce scanning process.

name: Oce ImageLogic Characteristics
shortDescription: Used in the Oce scanning process.

name: PrintImageMatching
shortDescription: Description needed.

name: DNGVersion
shortDescription: Encodes DNG four-tier version number; for version 1.1.0.0, the tag contains the bytes 1, 1, 0, 0. Used in IFD 0 of DNG files.
sourceOfTag:
DNG spec (1.3, 2009), p. 17

Exif Private IFD

name: DNGBackwardVersion
shortDescription: Defines oldest version of spec with which file is compatible. Used in IFD 0 of DNG files.
sourceOfTag:
DNG spec (1.3, 2009), p. 17

Exif Private IFD

name: UniqueCameraModel
shortDescription: Unique, non-localized nbame for camera model. Used in IFD 0 of DNG files.
sourceOfTag:
DNG spec (1.3, 2009), p. 18

Exif Private IFD

name: LocalizedCameraModel
shortDescription: Similar to 50708, with localized camera name. Used in IFD 0 of DNG files.
sourceOfTag:
DNG spec (1.3, 2009), p. 19

Exif Private IFD

name: CFAPlaneColor
shortDescription: Mapping between values in the CFAPattern tag and the plane numbers in LinearRaw space. Used in Raw IFD of DNG files.
sourceOfTag:
DNG spec (1.3, 2009), p. 19

Exif Private IFD

name: CFALayout
shortDescription: Spatial layout of the CFA. Used in Raw IFD of DNG files.
sourceOfTag:
DNG spec (1.3, 2009), p. 20

Exif Private IFD

name: LinearizationTable
shortDescription: Lookup table that maps stored values to linear values. Used in Raw IFD of DNG files.
sourceOfTag:
DNG spec (1.3, 2009), p. 21

Exif Private IFD

name: BlackLevelRepeatDim
shortDescription: Repeat pattern size for BlackLevel tag. Used in Raw IFD of DNG files.
sourceOfTag:
DNG spec (1.3, 2009), p. 21

Exif Private IFD

name: BlackLevel
shortDescription: Specifies the zero light encoding level.Used in Raw IFD of DNG files.
sourceOfTag:
DNG spec (1.3, 2009), p. 22

Exif Private IFD

name: BlackLevelDeltaH
shortDescription: Specifies the difference between zero light encoding level for each column and the baseline zero light encoding level. Used in Raw IFD of DNG files.
sourceOfTag:
DNG spec (1.3, 2009), p. 22

Exif Private IFD

name: BlackLevelDeltaV
shortDescription: Specifies the difference between zero light encoding level for each row and the baseline zero light encoding level. Used in Raw IFD of DNG files.
sourceOfTag:
DNG spec (1.3, 2009), p. 23

Exif Private IFD

name: WhiteLevel
shortDescription: Specifies the fully saturated encoding level for the raw sample values. Used in Raw IFD of DNG files.
sourceOfTag:
DNG spec (1.3, 2009), p. 24

Exif Private IFD

name: DefaultScale
shortDescription: For cameras with non-square pixels, specifies the default scale factors for each direction to convert the image to square pixels. Used in Raw IFD of DNG files.
sourceOfTag:
DNG spec (1.3, 2009), p. 24

Exif Private IFD

name: DefaultCropOrigin
shortDescription: Specifies the origin of the final image area, ignoring the extra pixels at edges used to prevent interpolation artifacts. Used in Raw IFD of DNG files.
sourceOfTag:
DNG spec (1.3, 2009), p. 25

Exif Private IFD

name: DefaultCropSize
shortDescription: Specifies size of final image area in raw image coordinates. Used in Raw IFD of DNG files.
sourceOfTag:
DNG spec (1.3, 2009), p. 26

Exif Private IFD

name: ColorMatrix1
shortDescription: Defines a transformation matrix that converts XYZ values to reference camera native color space values, under the first calibration illuminant. Used in IFD 0 of DNG files.
sourceOfTag:
DNG spec (1.3, 2009), p. 27

Exif Private IFD

name: ColorMatrix2
shortDescription: Defines a transformation matrix that converts XYZ values to reference camera native color space values, under the second calibration illuminant. Used in IFD 0 of DNG files.
sourceOfTag:
DNG spec (1.3, 2009), p. 28

Exif Private IFD

name: CameraCalibration1
shortDescription: Defines a calibration matrix that transforms reference camera native space values to individual camera native space values under the first calibration illuminant. Used in IFD 0 of DNG files.
sourceOfTag:
DNG spec (1.3, 2009), p. 28

Exif Private IFD

name: CameraCalibration2
shortDescription: Defines a calibration matrix that transforms reference camera native space values to individual camera native space values under the second calibration illuminant. Used in IFD 0 of DNG files.
sourceOfTag:
DNG spec (1.3, 2009), p. 29

Exif Private IFD

name: ReductionMatrix1
shortDescription: Defines a dimensionality reduction matrix for use as the first stage in converting color camera native space values to XYZ values, under the first calibration illuminant. Used in IFD 0 of DNG files.
sourceOfTag:
DNG spec (1.3, 2009), p. 30

Exif Private IFD

name: ReductionMatrix2
shortDescription: Defines a dimensionality reduction matrix for use as the first stage in converting color camera native space values to XYZ values, under the second calibration illuminant. Used in IFD 0 of DNG files.
sourceOfTag:
DNG spec (1.3, 2009), p. 30

Exif Private IFD

name: AnalogBalance
shortDescription: Pertaining to white balance, defines the gain, either analog or digital, that has been applied to the stored raw values. Used in IFD 0 of DNG files.
sourceOfTag:
DNG spec (1.3, 2009), p. 31

Exif Private IFD

name: AsShotNeutral
shortDescription: Specifies the selected white balance at the time of capture, encoded as the coordinates of a perfectly neutral color in linear reference space values. Used in IFD 0 of DNG files.
sourceOfTag:
DNG spec (1.3, 2009), p. 31

Exif Private IFD

name: AsShotWhiteXY
shortDescription: Specifies the selected white balance at the time of capture, encoded as x-y chromaticity coordinates. Used in IFD 0 of DNG files.
sourceOfTag:
DNG spec (1.3, 2009), p. 32

Exif Private IFD

name: BaselineExposure
shortDescription: Specifies in EV units how much to move the zero point for exposure compensation. Used in IFD 0 of DNG files.
sourceOfTag:
DNG spec (1.3, 2009), p. 32

Exif Private IFD

name: BaselineNoise
shortDescription: Specifies the relative noise of the camera model at a baseline ISO value of 100, compared to reference camera model. Used in IFD 0 of DNG files.
sourceOfTag:
DNG spec (1.3, 2009), p. 33

Exif Private IFD

name: BaselineSharpness
shortDescription: Specifies the relative amount of sharpening required for this camera model, compared to reference camera model. Used in IFD 0 of DNG files.
sourceOfTag:
DNG spec (1.3, 2009), p. 33

Exif Private IFD

name: BayerGreenSplit
shortDescription: For CFA images, specifies, in arbitrary units, how closely the values of the green pixels in the blue/green rows track the values of the green pixels in the red/green rows. Used in Raw IFD of DNG files.
sourceOfTag:
DNG spec (1.3, 2009), p. 34

Exif Private IFD

name: LinearResponseLimit
shortDescription: Specifies the fraction of the encoding range above which the response may become significantly non-linear. Used in IFD 0 of DNG files.
sourceOfTag:
DNG spec (1.3, 2009), p. 34

Exif Private IFD

name: CameraSerialNumber
shortDescription: Serial number of camera. Used in IFD 0 of DNG files.
sourceOfTag:
DNG spec (1.3, 2009), p. 35

Exif Private IFD

name: LensInfo
shortDescription: Information about the lens. Used in IFD 0 of DNG files.
sourceOfTag:
DNG spec (1.3, 2009), p. 35

Exif Private IFD

name: ChromaBlurRadius
shortDescription: Normally for non-CFA images, provides a hint about how much chroma blur ought to be applied. Used in Raw IFD of DNG files.
sourceOfTag:
DNG spec (1.3, 2009), p. 36

Exif Private IFD

name: AntiAliasStrength
shortDescription: Provides a hint about the strength of the camera's anti-aliasing filter. Used in Raw IFD of DNG files.
sourceOfTag:
DNG spec (1.3, 2009), p. 36

Exif Private IFD

name: ShadowScale
shortDescription: Used by Adobe Camera Raw to control sensitivity of its shadows slider. Used in IFD 0 of DNG files.
sourceOfTag:
DNG spec (1.3, 2009), p. 37

Exif Private IFD

name: DNGPrivateData
shortDescription: Provides a way for camera manufacturers to store private data in DNG files for use by their own raw convertors. Used in IFD 0 of DNG files.
sourceOfTag:
DNG spec (1.3, 2009), p. 37

Exif Private IFD

name: MakerNoteSafety
shortDescription: Lets the DNG reader know whether the Exif MakerNote tag is safe to preserve. Used in IFD 0 of DNG files.
sourceOfTag:
DNG spec (1.3, 2009), p. 38

Exif Private IFD

name: CalibrationIlluminant1
shortDescription: Illuminant used for first set of calibration tags. Used in IFD 0 of DNG files.
sourceOfTag:
DNG spec (1.3, 2009), p. 26

Exif Private IFD

name: CalibrationIlluminant2
shortDescription: Illuminant used for second set of calibration tags. Used in IFD 0 of DNG files.
sourceOfTag:
DNG spec (1.3, 2009), p. 27

Exif Private IFD

name: BestQualityScale
shortDescription: Specifies the amount by which the values of the DefaultScale tag need to be multiplied to achieve best quality image size. Used in Raw IFD of DNG files.
sourceOfTag:
DNG spec (1.3, 2009), p. 25

Exif Private IFD

name: RawDataUniqueID
shortDescription: Contains a 16-byte unique identifier for the raw image file in the DNG file. Used in IFD 0 of DNG files.
sourceOfTag:
DNG spec (1.3, 2009), p. 39

Exif Private IFD

name: Alias Layer Metadata
shortDescription: Alias Sketchbook Pro layer usage description.

name: OriginalRawFileName
shortDescription: Name of original file if the DNG file results from conversion from a non-DNG raw file. Used in IFD 0 of DNG files.
sourceOfTag:
DNG spec (1.3, 2009), p. 39

Exif Private IFD

name: OriginalRawFileData
shortDescription: If the DNG file was converted from a non-DNG raw file, then this tag contains the original raw data. Used in IFD 0 of DNG files.
sourceOfTag:
DNG spec (1.3, 2009), p. 40

Exif Private IFD

name: ActiveArea
shortDescription: Defines the active (non-masked) pixels of the sensor. Used in Raw IFD of DNG files.
sourceOfTag:
DNG spec (1.3, 2009), p. 41

Exif Private IFD

name: MaskedAreas
shortDescription: List of non-overlapping rectangle coordinates of fully masked pixels, which can optimally be used by DNG readers to measure the black encoding level. Used in Raw IFD of DNG files.
sourceOfTag:
DNG spec (1.3, 2009), p. 42

Exif Private IFD

name: AsShotICCProfile
shortDescription: Contains ICC profile that, in conjunction with the AsShotPreProfileMatrix tag, specifies a default color rendering from camera color space coordinates (linear reference values) into the ICC profile connection space. Used in IFD 0 of DNG files.
sourceOfTag:
DNG spec (1.3, 2009), p. 42

Exif Private IFD

name: AsShotPreProfileMatrix
shortDescription: Specifies a matrix that should be applied to the camera color space coordinates before processing the values through the ICC profile specified in the AsShotICCProfile tag. Used in IFD 0 of DNG files.
sourceOfTag:
DNG spec (1.3, 2009), p. 43

Exif Private IFD

name: CurrentICCProfile
shortDescription:
The CurrentICCProfile and CurrentPreProfileMatrix tags have the same purpose and usage as
the AsShotICCProfile and AsShotPreProfileMatrix tag pair, except they are for use by raw file
editors rather than camera manufacturers. Used in IFD 0 of DNG files.
sourceOfTag:
DNG spec (1.3, 2009), p. 44

Exif Private IFD

name: CurrentPreProfileMatrix
shortDescription:
The CurrentICCProfile and CurrentPreProfileMatrix tags have the same purpose and usage as
the AsShotICCProfile and AsShotPreProfileMatrix tag pair, except they are for use by raw file
editors rather than camera manufacturers. Used in IFD 0 of DNG files.
sourceOfTag:
DNG spec (1.3, 2009), p. 44

Exif Private IFD

name: ColorimetricReference
shortDescription: The DNG color model documents a transform between camera colors and CIE XYZ values. This tag describes the colorimetric reference for the CIE XYZ values. 0 = The XYZ values are scene-referred. 1 = The XYZ values are output-referred, using the ICC profile perceptual dynamic range. Used in IFD 0 of DNG files.
sourceOfTag:
DNG spec (1.3, 2009), p. 45

Exif Private IFD

name: CameraCalibrationSignature
shortDescription: A UTF-8 encoded string associated with the CameraCalibration1 and CameraCalibration2 tags. Used in IFD 0 of DNG files.
sourceOfTag:
DNG spec (1.3, 2009), p. 46

Exif Private IFD

name: ProfileCalibrationSignature
shortDescription: A UTF-8 encoded string associated with the camera profile tags. Used in IFD 0 or CameraProfile IFD of DNG files.
sourceOfTag:
DNG spec (1.3, 2009), p. 46

Exif Private IFD

name: ExtraCameraProfiles
shortDescription: A list of file offsets to extra Camera Profile IFDs. The format of a camera profile begins with a 16-bit byte order mark (MM or II) followed by a 16-bit "magic" number equal to 0x4352 (CR), a 32-bit IFD offset, and then a standard TIFF format IFD. Used in IFD 0 of DNG files.

name: AsShotProfileName
shortDescription: A UTF-8 encoded string containing the name of the "as shot" camera profile, if any. Used in IFD 0 of DNG files.
sourceOfTag:
DNG spec (1.3, 2009), p. 47

Exif Private IFD

name: NoiseReductionApplied
shortDescription: Indicates how much noise reduction has been applied to the raw data on a scale of 0.0 to 1.0. A 0.0 value indicates that no noise reduction has been applied. A 1.0 value indicates that the "ideal" amount of noise reduction has been applied, i.e. that the DNG reader should not apply additional noise reduction by default. A value of 0/0 indicates that this parameter is unknown. Used in Raw IFD of DNG files.
sourceOfTag:
DNG spec (1.3, 2009), p. 48

Exif Private IFD

name: ProfileName
shortDescription: A UTF-8 encoded string containing the name of the camera profile. Used in IFD 0 or Camera Profile IFD of DNG files.
sourceOfTag:
DNG spec (1.3, 2009), p. 48

Exif Private IFD

name: ProfileHueSatMapDims
shortDescription: Specifies the number of input samples in each dimension of the hue/saturation/value mapping tables. The data for these tables are stored in ProfileHueSatMapData1 and ProfileHueSatMapData2 tags. Allowed values include the following: HueDivisions >= 1; SaturationDivisions >= 2; ValueDivisions >=1. Used in IFD 0 or Camera Profile IFD of DNG files.
sourceOfTag:
DNG spec (1.3, 2009), p. 49

Exif Private IFD

name: ProfileHueSatMapData1
shortDescription: Contains the data for the first hue/saturation/value mapping table. Each entry of the table contains three 32-bit IEEE floating-point values. The first entry is hue shift in degrees; the second entry is saturation scale factor; and the third entry is a value scale factor. Used in IFD 0 or Camera Profile IFD of DNG files.
sourceOfTag:
DNG spec (1.3, 2009), p. 50

Exif Private IFD

name: ProfileHueSatMapData2
shortDescription: Contains the data for the second hue/saturation/value mapping table. Each entry of the table contains three 32-bit IEEE floating-point values. The first entry is hue shift in degrees; the second entry is saturation scale factor; and the third entry is a value scale factor. Used in IFD 0 or Camera Profile IFD of DNG files.
sourceOfTag:
DNG spec (1.3, 2009), p. 50-1

Exif Private IFD

name: ProfileToneCurve
shortDescription: Contains a default tone curve that can be applied while processing the image as a starting point for user adjustments. The curve is specified as a list of 32-bit IEEE floating-point value pairs in linear gamma. Each sample has an input value in the range of 0.0 to 1.0, and an output value in the range of 0.0 to 1.0. The first sample is required to be (0.0, 0.0), and the last sample is required to be (1.0, 1.0). Interpolated the curve using a cubic spline. Used in IFD 0 or Camera Profile IFD of DNG files.
sourceOfTag:
DNG spec (1.3, 2009), p. 51

Exif Private IFD

name: ProfileEmbedPolicy
shortDescription: Contains information about the usage rules for the associated camera profile. The valid values and meanings are: 0 = “allow copying”; 1 = “embed if used”; 2 = “embed never”; and 3 = “no restrictions”. Used in IFD 0 or Camera Profile IFD of DNG files.
sourceOfTag:
DNG spec (1.3, 2009), p. 52

Exif Private IFD

name: ProfileCopyright
shortDescription: Contains information about the usage rules for the associated camera profile. The valid values and meanings are: 0 = “allow copying”; 1 = “embed if used”; 2 = “embed never”; and 3 = “no restrictions”. Used in IFD 0 or Camera Profile IFD of DNG files.
sourceOfTag:
DNG spec (1.3, 2009), p. 52

Exif Private IFD

name: ForwardMatrix1
shortDescription: Defines a matrix that maps white balanced camera colors to XYZ D50 colors. Used in IFD 0 or Camera Profile IFD of DNG files.
sourceOfTag:
DNG spec (1.3, 2009), p. 53

Exif Private IFD

name: ForwardMatrix2
shortDescription: Defines a matrix that maps white balanced camera colors to XYZ D50 colors. Used in IFD 0 or Camera Profile IFD of DNG files.
sourceOfTag:
DNG spec (1.3, 2009), p. 54

Exif Private IFD

name: PreviewApplicationName
shortDescription: A UTF-8 encoded string containing the name of the application that created the preview stored in the IFD. Used in Preview IFD of DNG files.
sourceOfTag:
DNG spec (1.3, 2009), p. 54

Exif Private IFD

name: PreviewApplicationVersion
shortDescription: A UTF-8 encoded string containing the version number of the application that created the preview stored in the IFD. Used in Preview IFD of DNG files.
sourceOfTag:
DNG spec (1.3, 2009), p. 55

Exif Private IFD

name: PreviewSettingsName
shortDescription: A UTF-8 encoded string containing the name of the conversion settings (for example, snapshot name) used for the preview stored in the IFD. Used in Preview IFD of DNG files.
sourceOfTag:
DNG spec (1.3, 2009), p. 55

Exif Private IFD

name: PreviewSettingsDigest
shortDescription: A unique ID of the conversion settings (for example, MD5 digest) used to render the preview stored in the IFD. Used in Preview IFD of DNG files.
sourceOfTag:
DNG spec (1.3, 2009), p. 56

Exif Private IFD

name: PreviewColorSpace
shortDescription: This tag specifies the color space in which the rendered preview in this IFD is stored. The valid values include: 0 = Unknown; 1 = Gray Gamma 2.2; 2 = sRGB; 3 = Adobe RGB; and 4 = ProPhoto RGB. Used in Preview IFD of DNG files.
sourceOfTag:
DNG spec (1.3, 2009), p. 56

Exif Private IFD

name: PreviewDateTime
shortDescription: This tag is an ASCII string containing the name of the date/time at which the preview stored in the IFD was rendered, encoded using ISO 8601 format. Used in Preview IFD of DNG files.
sourceOfTag:
DNG spec (1.3, 2009), p. 57

Exif Private IFD

name: RawImageDigest
shortDescription: MD5 digest of the raw image data. All pixels in the image are processed in row-scan order. Each pixel is zero padded to 16 or 32 bits deep (16-bit for data less than or equal to 16 bits deep, 32-bit otherwise). The data is processed in little-endian byte order. Used in IFD 0 of DNG files.
sourceOfTag:
DNG spec (1.3, 2009), p. 57

Exif Private IFD

name: OriginalRawFileDigest
shortDescription: MD5 digest of the data stored in the OriginalRawFileData tag. Used in IFD 0 of DNG files.
sourceOfTag:
DNG spec (1.3, 2009), p. 58

Exif Private IFD

name: SubTileBlockSize
shortDescription: Normally, pixels within a tile are stored in simple row-scan order. This tag specifies that the pixels within a tile should be grouped first into rectangular blocks of the specified size. These blocks are stored in row-scan order. Within each block, the pixels are stored in row-scan order. Used in Raw IFD of DNG files.
sourceOfTag:
DNG spec (1.3, 2009), p. 58

Exif Private IFD

name: RowInterleaveFactor
shortDescription: Specifies that rows of the image are stored in interleaved order. The value of the tag specifies the number of interleaved fields. Used in Raw IFD of DNG files.
sourceOfTag:
DNG spec (1.3, 2009), p. 59

Exif Private IFD

name: ProfileLookTableDims
shortDescription: Specifies the number of input samples in each dimension of a default "look" table. The data for this table is stored in the ProfileLookTableData tag. Allowed values include: HueDivisions >= 1; SaturationDivisions >= 2; and ValueDivisions >= 1. Used in IFD 0 or Camera Profile IFD of DNG files.
sourceOfTag:
DNG spec (1.3, 2009), p. 59

Exif Private IFD

name: ProfileLookTableData
shortDescription: Default "look" table that can be applied while processing the image as a starting point for user adjustment. This table uses the same format as the tables stored in the ProfileHueSatMapData1 and ProfileHueSatMapData2 tags, and is applied in the same color space. However, it should be applied later in the processing pipe, after any exposure compensation and/or fill light stages, but before any tone curve stage. Each entry of the table contains three 32-bit IEEE floating-point values. The first entry is hue shift in degrees, the second entry is a saturation scale factor, and the third entry is a value scale factor. Used in IFD 0 or Camera Profile IFD of DNG files.
sourceOfTag:
DNG spec (1.3, 2009), p. 60

Exif Private IFD

name: OpcodeList1
shortDescription: Specifies the list of opcodes (image processing operation codes) that should be applied to the raw image, as read directly from the file. Used in Raw IFD of DNG files.
sourceOfTag:
DNG spec (1.3, 2009), p. 61

Exif Private IFD

name: OpcodeList2
shortDescription: Specifies the list of opcodes (image processing operation codes) that should be applied to the raw image, just after it has been mapped to linear reference values. Used in Raw IFD of DNG files.
sourceOfTag:
DNG spec (1.3, 2009), p. 61

Exif Private IFD

name: OpcodeList3
shortDescription: Specifies the list of opcodes (image processing operation codes) that should be applied to the raw image, just after it has been demosaiced. Used in Raw IFD of DNG files.
sourceOfTag:
DNG spec (1.3, 2009), p. 62

Exif Private IFD

name: NoiseProfile
shortDescription: Describes the amount of noise in a raw image; models the amount of signal-dependent photon (shot) noise and signal-independent sensor readout noise, two common sources of noise in raw images. Used in Raw IFD of DNG files.
sourceOfTag:
DNG spec (1.3, 2009), p. 62-3

Exif Private IFD

name: OriginalDefaultFinalSize
shortDescription: If this file is a proxy for a larger original DNG file, this tag specifics the default final size of the larger original file from which this proxy was generated. The default value for this tag is default final size of the current DNG file, which is DefaultCropSize * DefaultScale.

name: OriginalBestQualityFinalSize
shortDescription: If this file is a proxy for a larger original DNG file, this tag specifics the best quality final size of the larger original file from which this proxy was generated. The default value for this tag is the OriginalDefaultFinalSize, if specified. Otherwise the default value for this tag is the best quality size of the current DNG file, which is DefaultCropSize * DefaultScale * BestQualityScale.

name: OriginalDefaultCropSize
shortDescription: If this file is a proxy for a larger original DNG file, this tag specifics the DefaultCropSize of the larger original file from which this proxy was generated. The default value for this tag is the OriginalDefaultFinalSize, if specified. Otherwise, the default value for this tag is the DefaultCropSize of the current DNG file.

name: ProfileHueSatMapEncoding
shortDescription: Provides a way for color profiles to specify how indexing into a 3D HueSatMap is performed during raw conversion. This tag is not applicable to 2.5D HueSatMap tables (i.e., where the Value dimension is 1). The currently defined values are: 0 = Linear encoding (method described in DNG spec); 1 = sRGB encoding (method described in DNG spec).

name: ProfileLookTableEncoding
shortDescription: Provides a way for color profiles to specify how indexing into a 3D LookTable is performed during raw conversion. This tag is not applicable to a 2.5D LookTable (i.e., where the Value dimension is 1). The currently defined values are: 0 = Linear encoding (method described in DNG spec); 1 = sRGB encoding (method described in DNG spec).

name: BaselineExposureOffset
shortDescription: Provides a way for color profiles to increase or decrease exposure during raw conversion. BaselineExposureOffset specifies the amount (in EV units) to add to th e BaselineExposure tag during image rendering. For example, if the BaselineExposure value fo r a given camera model is +0.3, and the BaselineExposureOffset value for a given camera profile used to render an image for that camera model is -0.7, then th e actual default exposure value used during rendering will be +0.3 - 0.7 = -0.4.

name: DefaultBlackRender
shortDescription: This optional tag in a color profile provides a hint to the raw converter regarding how to handle the black point (e.g., flare subtraction) during rendering. The currently defined values are: 0 = Auto; 1 = None. If set to Auto, the raw converter should perform black subtraction during rendering. The amount and method of black subtraction may be automatically determined and may be image-dependent. If set to None, the raw converter should not perform any black subtraction during rendering. This may be desirable when using color lookup tables (e.g., LookTable) or tone curves in camera profiles to perform a fixed, consistent level of black subtraction.

name: NewRawImageDigest
shortDescription: This tag is a modified MD5 digest of the raw image data. It has been updated from the algorithm used to compute the RawImageDigest tag be more multi-processor friendly, and to support lossy compression algorithms. The details of the algorithm used to compute this tag are documented in the Adobe DNG SDK source code.

name: RawToPreviewGain
shortDescription: The gain (what number the sample values are multiplied by) between the main raw IFD and the preview IFD containing this tag.

name: DefaultUserCrop
shortDescription: Specifies a default user crop rectangle in relative coordinates. The values must satisfy: 0.0 <= top < bottom <= 1.0; 0.0 <= left < right <= 1.0. The default values of (top = 0, left = 0, bottom = 1, right = 1) correspond exactly to the default crop rectangle (as specified by the DefaultCropOrigin and DefaultCropSize tags).
